event.title: Let's stop the Snoopers' Charter
event.description:
We're holding a workshop for interested/concerned citizens who would be willing to lobby their local MP on the Snoopers' Charter. This bill will be going to parliament soon so it's vital to educate our MPs about it.

We'll provide talking points and relevant material and we'll practice what to say and how. You can meet other people at this meeting so that you can lobby as part of a group - which is less daunting if it's your first time.

(Note: this is to prepare for meeting your MP, who won't actually be at this meeting - that comes later)

Agenda

• Why are we lobbying MPs

• Background

• What are the main
concerns?

• What are the positions of
the political parties?

• Talking to your MP

• What your MP might say

• What MPs have said

• What else can I do?
